name: Home is Blue
description:
Full Screen recommended!

The current playable browser version is a post jam version with some small fixes and it's easier!

The turtles are born and they need your help to reach their home!  Use the mouse to do it,  do left click on the place you want them to go and they will obey, beware of the dangers that threaten them, such as predators and dangerous objects. The goal is to reach the sea. Check the instructions that appear at the bottom of the gameplay screen to know how many turtles you have to save per level.

They will be very grateful to you.
